def.name: Small Trove
def.description: Someone had hidden this away years ago and never came back to claim it.

def.name: Hellfire Warlock
def.description: This mage's incantations are lost among his mad laughter and the roar of hellfire.

def.name: Repaired Door
def.description: Someone has gone through a lot of effort to repair this seemingly mundane door.

def.name: Lizardfolk Druid
def.description: It almost looks like that marsh mystic is having a conversation with a pair of crocodiles...

def.name: Lizardfolk Druid
def.description: It almost looks like that marsh mystic is having a conversation with a pair of crocodiles...

def.name: Fell Troll
def.description: Somehow more frightening than other varieties, the fell troll licks its lips before roaring towards your fresh meat.

def.name: Ancient Hieroglyphs
def.description: You find a series of messages that were carved into the stone many lifetimes ago.

def.name: Lizardfolk Druid
def.description: It almost looks like that marsh mystic is having a conversation with a pair of crocodiles...

def.name: Overgrown Plants
def.description: The tangle of plants here have overgrown everything beneath a living mat of roots and vines.

def.name: Small Trove
def.description: Someone had hidden this away years ago and never came back to claim it.

def.name: Small Trove
def.description: Someone had hidden this away years ago and never came back to claim it.

def.name: Ornate Door
def.description: You wonder what's worth more, the door itself or whatever is on the other side.

def.name: Invisible Chest
def.description: Your stubbed toe is the only reason you know the chest is here. You, in fact, stumbled upon it.

def.name: Invisible Chest
def.description: Your stubbed toe is the only reason you know the chest is here. You, in fact, stumbled upon it.

def.name: Battle Wight Challenge
def.description: A humanoid undead calls out to you with a raspy voice, challenging you to a duel.

def.name: Pile of Treasure
def.description: The lustrous shine of this pile of wealth is finally enough to overcome your caution.

def.name: Escaped Experiments
def.description: You are knocked over as a group of tiny constructs tear through the passage and into the darkness.

def.name: Enraged Fire Elemental
def.description: An inhuman roar is heard, followed by a bright orange light. Something has angered a fiery elemental, and you're in its path.

def.name: Shadar-Kai Soul Slaver
def.description: A robed figure blocks your path with a menacing gaze. "Another soul for the taking."

def.name: Shadar-Kai Soul Slaver
def.description: A robed figure blocks your path with a menacing gaze. "Another soul for the taking."

def.name: Werewolf Pack
def.description: At first you only see one or two, but soon you realize the rest of the pack is surrounding you.

def.name: Werewolf Pack
def.description: At first you only see one or two, but soon you realize the rest of the pack is surrounding you.

def.name: Werewolf Pack
def.description: At first you only see one or two, but soon you realize the rest of the pack is surrounding you.

def.name: Werewolf Pack
def.description: At first you only see one or two, but soon you realize the rest of the pack is surrounding you.

def.name: Hellfire Magus
def.description: The demonic child of a succubus grins as hellfire gathers in her hand.

def.name: Hellfire Magus
def.description: The demonic child of a succubus grins as hellfire gathers in her hand.

def.name: Frost Giant
def.description: Towering above you, enormous battleaxe on its shoulder, the frost giant barely acknowledges your existence.

def.name: Frost Giant
def.description: Towering above you, enormous battleaxe on its shoulder, the frost giant barely acknowledges your existence.

def.name: Large Scroll Bag
def.description: This satchel is large enough to carry dozens of scrolls.

def.name: Wizened Werewolf
def.description: Scars from previous victories act as highlights for the weathered face.

def.name: Wizened Werewolf
def.description: Scars from previous victories act as highlights for the weathered face.

def.name: Large Scroll Bag
def.description: This satchel is large enough to carry dozens of scrolls.

def.name: Werewolf Pack
def.description: At first you only see one or two, but soon you realize the rest of the pack is surrounding you.

def.name: Dart Bank Trap
def.description: A series of gears click as you step on the pressure plate.

def.name: Well Constructed Trap
def.description: Any trap maker would be proud to build such a solid and reliable device.

def.name: Guarded Trap Door
def.description: Someone would rather see you die than make use of that passage.

def.name: Guarded Trap Door
def.description: Someone would rather see you die than make use of that passage.

def.name: Treasure Trove
def.description: You drop to your knees, mouth agape. This is what you've been searching for.

def.name: Broken Construct
def.description: Pieces of the massive contraption are scattered across the floor. Perhaps it could be reassembled?

def.name: Dart Bank Trap
def.description: A series of gears click as you step on the pressure plate.

def.name: Well Constructed Trap
def.description: Any trap maker would be proud to build such a solid and reliable device.

def.name: Dwarven Drinking Contest - Round 3
def.description: Lifting your head off the table, you're barely able to make out a fresh keg of ale being carried by a grinning, thirsty dwarf before you pass back out.

def.name: Battle Pit
def.description: The current champion paints its face with the latest victim's blood before howling at you.

def.name: Scattered Coins
def.description: The line of coins makes you think either someone had their purse cut or they're leaving a very expensive trail back home.

def.name: Breeding Pit
def.description: Unidentifiable monsters slither across one another at the bottom of a large, black hole in the ground.

def.name: Breeding Pit
def.description: Unidentifiable monsters slither across one another at the bottom of a large, black hole in the ground.

def.name: Large Chest
def.description: A sizable chest, most likely containing something of great value.

def.name: Large Chest
def.description: A sizable chest, most likely containing something of great value.

def.name: Frost Goblin Warband
def.description: Well-trained and hardened by the elements, the warband begins to chant and clang swords against shields, signaling a coming battle.

def.name: Legion Devil
def.description: The armored fiend moves with practiced precision, a consummate warrior form the armies of Hell.

def.name: Legion Devil
def.description: The armored fiend moves with practiced precision, a consummate warrior form the armies of Hell.

def.name: Foulspawn Berserker
def.description: Each wound seems to make the creature larger and more fearsome.

def.name: Poisoned Arrow Trap
def.description: A single nick from a poisoned arrow can be enough to fell even the mightiest hero.

def.name: Poisoned Arrow Trap
def.description: A single nick from a poisoned arrow can be enough to fell even the mightiest hero.

def.name: Frost Goblin Warband
def.description: Well-trained and hardened by the elements, the warband begins to chant and clang swords against shields, signaling a coming battle.

def.name: Arcane Power Node
def.description: You find a wizard kneeling at a glowing line on the floor. He looks back at you over his shoulder, eyes replaced by dancing energy.

def.name: Arcane Power Node
def.description: You find a wizard kneeling at a glowing line on the floor. He looks back at you over his shoulder, eyes replaced by dancing energy.

def.name: Pile of Treasure
def.description: The lustrous shine of this pile of wealth is finally enough to overcome your caution.

def.name: Camouflaged Rockfall Trap
def.description: You'd never know there was danger nearby were it not for the dried blood on the stones at your feet.

def.name: Radiant Pool
def.description: Near a glowing lake, you find a campsite built for six travelers and a series of plans for defending a far-away city.

def.name: Pulsing Crystal
def.description: A misty image of a place you've never seen hovers over this crystal.

def.name: Enchanted Chest
def.description: You can feel the magic enchantments protecting this chest, but with time anything can be opened.

def.description: A misty image of a place you've never seen hovers over this crystal.

def.name: Pulsing Crystal
def.description: A misty image of a place you've never seen hovers over this crystal.

def.name: Series of Levers
def.description: A complex series of levers all connect to a single, glowing archway in the middle of the room.

def.description: A misty image of a place you've never seen hovers over this crystal.

def.name: Frost Giant
def.description: Towering above you, enormous battleaxe on its shoulder, the frost giant barely acknowledges your existence.

def.name: Spiked Pit Trap
def.description: This triggered trap hasn't fully reset yet. Before it closes all the way, you hear the faint whimper of a less-skilled adventurer.

def.name: Poisoned Blade Trap
def.description: Because the sharply bladed discs weren't deadly enough, they've now been edged with poison.

def.name: Radiant Pool
def.description: Near a glowing lake, you find a campsite built for six travelers and a series of plans for defending a far-away city.

def.name: Partially Intact Armory
def.description: This stash of weaponry was partially looted, but may still hold something of value.

def.name: Ancient Portal
def.description: A hooded man points to the ancient portal and whispers, "Know your destination or know your end."

def.name: Magic Mirror
def.description: Depending on the angle held, this mirror can show the reflections of distant places.

def.name: Long-Lost Message
def.description: On an old, blood-stained scroll you read, "To 'L', my love. Should this note reach you before I am home, know that I think of you always and we will not be apart for much longer."

def.name: Ancient Portal
def.description: A hooded man points to the ancient portal and whispers, "Know your destination or know your end."

def.name: Underground River
def.description: Flowing from an unseen source, the water is cool and refreshing.

def.name: Ancient Golem
def.description: The ancient construct stands frozen, waiting for its master to bring it back to life.

def.name: Enraged Zombie Hulk
def.description: Its own muscles tearing from bone, the undead monster lunges out at anything it can grab.

def.name: Enraged Zombie Hulk
def.description: Its own muscles tearing from bone, the undead monster lunges out at anything it can grab.

def.name: Treasure Trove
def.description: You drop to your knees, mouth agape. This is what you've been searching for.

def.name: Ancient Troll
def.description: You've heard tales of hollow-eyed emaciated trolls like this, but you never thought you'd have to fight one.

def.name: Large Chest
def.description: A sizable chest, most likely containing something of great value.

def.name: Enchanted Chest
def.description: You can feel the magic enchantments protecting this chest, but with time anything can be opened.

def.name: Eyes in the Water
def.description: What looked like dancing lights in the water at first, now seem to be something else entirely.

def.name: Plagueburst
def.description: With a cackle and explosion of spores, an otherworldly creature fills the room with death and disease.

def.name: Werewolf Outcast
def.description: Shunned by others of its kind, this bloodthirsty beast looks to take its pain and suffering out on you.

def.name: Spike Trap
def.description: A small bit of blood provides a hint as to the trap's location.

def.name: Spike Trap
def.description: A small bit of blood provides a hint as to the trap's location.

def.name: Large Coin Pile
def.description: Your eyes get wide when you realize how valuable this large pile of coins might be.

def.name: Ancient Hieroglyphs
def.description: You find a series of messages that were carved into the stone many lifetimes ago.

def.name: Battle Wight
def.description: Possessed of unnatural intelligence, this undead creature could pass as a living being if you squint... and hold your nose.

def.name: Stone Puzzle
def.description: This intricate stone mechanism is clearly a puzzle meant to hide the way beyond.

def.name: Battle Wight
def.description: Possessed of unnatural intelligence, this undead creature could pass as a living being if you squint... and hold your nose.

def.name: Large Chest
def.description: A sizable chest, most likely containing something of great value.

def.name: Magic Mirror
def.description: Depending on the angle held, this mirror can show the reflections of distant places.

def.name: Radiant Pool
def.description: Near a glowing lake, you find a campsite built for six travelers and a series of plans for defending a far-away city.

def.name: Radiant Pool
def.description: Near a glowing lake, you find a campsite built for six travelers and a series of plans for defending a far-away city.

def.name: Engraved Case
def.description: You find a large engraved case with the initials "GDY" engraved and lined with silver.

def.name: Overgrown Plants
def.description: The tangle of plants here have overgrown everything beneath a living mat of roots and vines.

def.name: Greenscale Marsh Mystic
def.description: Swamp waters gather around your feet, as though being manipulated by an unseen force.

def.name: Greenscale Marsh Mystic
def.description: Swamp waters gather around your feet, as though being manipulated by an unseen force.

def.name: Wandering Blazing Skeleton
def.description: As you enter the room, a fiery skeleton ambles in from another exit. While lacking in purpose, it's still hostile to you.

def.name: Wererat Patrol
def.description: A mixture of men and rats, the patrol moves through the area, unaware of your presence.

def.name: Crying Ghost
def.description: Try as you might, you're not really sure how to console a sad spirit.

def.name: Cephalon
def.description: A psychic roar of anger and anguish echoes through your minds and across the blasted ruins of the chasm as an intellect devourer larger than any you've ever seen appears from a blast of blue flame and leaps towards you.

def.name: Damaged Battle Wight
def.description: The rot is beginning to show on this wight. Its movements are shaky and slow, but that doesn't stop it from charging at you.

def.name: A Supernatural Argument
def.description: Their arguments stated, the Angel and Demon both turn to you and ask "Mortal, what is your opinion?"

def.name: A Supernatural Argument
def.description: Their arguments stated, the Angel and Demon both turn to you and ask "Mortal, what is your opinion?"

def.name: Wandering Scholar
def.description: Nose buried in an ancient tome, the scholar fails to notice anyone is nearby before stumbling into the middle of your campsite.

def.name: Wererat Sewer Mage
def.description: The reeking stench of this venomous mage hits you even before his spells.

def.name: Plaguefire Blazing Skeleton
def.description: This skeleton is wreathed in an unnatural fire, blue in color, which appears to flow in baffling, mind-twisting ways.

def.name: Repaired Door
def.description: Someone has gone through a lot of effort to repair this seemingly mundane door.

def.name: Foulspawn Hulk
def.description: The creature's armor is torn away as each blow received makes it grow bigger and stronger.

def.name: Skeleton Snipers
def.description: You see an arrow bounce off the wall next to you. It's hard to pinpoint its origin.

def.name: Shadar-Kai Soul Hunters
def.description: Two pale foes approach with weapons at the ready. "No lost souls left... I suppose we'll have to make another."

def.name: Underground Lake
def.description: What evils lurk beneath the surface of the murky black lagoon?

def.name: Underground Lake
def.description: What evils lurk beneath the surface of the murky black lagoon?

def.name: Hidden Cache
def.description: And to think you never would have found this well-hidden trove if you hadn't tripped on that rock.

def.name: Hidden Cache
def.description: And to think you never would have found this well-hidden trove if you hadn't tripped on that rock.

def.name: Blade Trap
def.description: A well-hidden trap.

def.name: Horde of Imps
def.description: You know there are more embarrassing ways to die, but none come to mind...

def.name: Broken Construct
def.description: Pieces of the massive contraption are scattered across the floor. Perhaps it could be reassembled?

def.name: Cunning Troll
def.description: Smarter than your average troll, this one almost seems to be assessing the situation instead of simply charging into battle.

def.name: Shocktroop Devil
def.description: Standing before you, sword and shield in hand, towers a front-line soldier in hell's army.

def.name: Enchanted Reliquary
def.description: A soft white glow radiates from the carved box. From a distance you can feel the power of the items within.

def.description: A soft white glow radiates from the carved box. From a distance you can feel the power of the items within.

def.name: Enchanted Reliquary
def.description: A soft white glow radiates from the carved box. From a distance you can feel the power of the items within.

def.name: Battle Wight Stalker
def.description: You hear a soft sound behind you. You turn around, only to come face to face with a large, undead brute!

def.name: Magical Barrier
def.description: You are jolted back a few feet after stepping into a heretofore unseen wall of energy.

def.name: Ornate Door
def.description: You wonder what's worth more, the door itself or whatever is on the other side.

def.name: Scalding Steam Vent Trap
def.description: This trap won't kill you quickly, but instead leave you in agonizing pain for a while before you finally succumb to your injuries.

def.name: Fishing Pond
def.description: By the side of a tranquil pool lays an old fishing pole and a pair of moldering boots.

def.name: Fire Elemental
def.description: The shimmer of heat precedes the creature of pure fire, which moves to block your path.

def.name: Poison Vent Trap
def.description: A sickly-sweet scent is coming from the floor.

def.name: Large Chest
def.description: A sizable chest, most likely containing something of great value.

def.name: Entombed Blazing Skeleton
def.description: Opening a sarcophagus reveals an intact skeleton. Unfortunately, it ignites and rises from its grave, fixing its eyeless gaze on you.

def.name: Poison Vent Trap
def.description: A sickly-sweet scent is coming from the floor.

def.name: Poison Vent Trap
def.description: A sickly-sweet scent is coming from the floor.

def.name: Diseased Zombie Hulk
def.description: Diseased chunks of flesh fall from the rotten creature as it drags itself towards you.

def.description: One more step and you would have been caught in the lizardfolk's trap, but you're able to defend yourself as he rushes in to finish the job.

def.description: A misty image of a place you've never seen hovers over this crystal.

def.description: Splashes of color on the walls and floor, along with open jars of glowing liquid, show someone had applied this magical paint to an object that is now gone.

def.name: Roaring Campfire
def.description: This well-tended camp beside a warm fire would be a serene scene if only the camp's owners weren't missing.

def.name: Have a Seat
def.description: A slender man with a toothy grin sits in a large, red chair. He motions to a similar chair and holds out a glass of brandy.

def.description: The only sound you can hear in this supernatural silence is the beating of your own heart.

def.description: The lockbox is impressive both in size and quality; the box itself might be worth nearly as much as the contents.

def.name: Shocktroop Devil
def.description: Standing before you, sword and shield in hand, towers a front-line soldier in hell's army.

def.name: Arcane Power Node
def.description: You find a wizard kneeling at a glowing line on the floor. He looks back at you over his shoulder, eyes replaced by dancing energy.

def.name: Cephalon
def.description: A psychic roar of anger and anguish echoes through your minds and across the blasted ruins of the chasm as an intellect devourer larger than any you've ever seen appears from a blast of blue flame and leaps towards you.

def.name: Bridge Troll
def.description: This troll seems willing to play some kind of game before it feasts on your bones.

def.name: Series of Levers
def.description: A complex series of levers all connect to a single, glowing archway in the middle of the room.

def.name: Series of Levers
def.description: A complex series of levers all connect to a single, glowing archway in the middle of the room.

def.name: Earth Elemental
def.description: The ground trembles and shakes before rising up and stacking into a humanoid form.

def.name: Earth Elemental
def.description: The ground trembles and shakes before rising up and stacking into a humanoid form.

def.name: Rime Hound
def.description: No mere winter wolf, this creature is covered in icy spikes.

def.name: Lesser Fire Elemental
def.description: The burning pyre before you shifts and moves, striding towards you with the form of a man.

def.name: Werewolf Pack
def.description: At first you only see one or two, but soon you realize the rest of the pack is surrounding you.

def.name: Demonic Runes
def.description: Each rune seems to speak its own name with a hellish growl.

def.name: Earth Elemental
def.description: The ground trembles and shakes before rising up and stacking into a humanoid form.

def.name: Wizened Werewolf
def.description: Scars from previous victories act as highlights for the weathered face.

def.name: Rimefire Golem
def.description: You're not sure you can outlast the construct's constant clubbing attacks.

def.name: Treasure Trove
def.description: You drop to your knees, mouth agape. This is what you've been searching for.

def.name: Treasure Trove
def.description: You drop to your knees, mouth agape. This is what you've been searching for.

def.name: Detached Shadows
def.description: You don't notice it right away, but your shadow seems intent on doing its own thing, regardless of your actions.

def.name: Skeletal Soldier
def.description: This long-dead soldier still has some fight in it.

def.name: Skeletal Soldier
def.description: This long-dead soldier still has some fight in it.

def.name: Explosive Runes
def.description: One wrong step, one wrong word and there won't be anyone left standing.

def.name: Entombed Blazing Skeleton
def.description: Opening a sarcophagus reveals an intact skeleton. Unfortunately, it ignites and rises from its grave, fixing its eyeless gaze on you.

def.name: Entombed Blazing Skeleton
def.description: Opening a sarcophagus reveals an intact skeleton. Unfortunately, it ignites and rises from its grave, fixing its eyeless gaze on you.

def.name: Cephalon
def.description: A psychic roar of anger and anguish echoes through your minds and across the blasted ruins of the chasm as an intellect devourer larger than any you've ever seen appears from a blast of blue flame and leaps towards you.

def.name: Spider Statue
def.description: You hear a faint skittering as thousands of tiny black shadows move across a massive, onyx spider statue.

def.name: Spider Statue
def.description: You hear a faint skittering as thousands of tiny black shadows move across a massive, onyx spider statue.

def.name: Ethereal Chest
def.description: The large treasure chest seems to fade between realities whenever someone gets too close.

def.name: Magic Mirror
def.description: Depending on the angle held, this mirror can show the reflections of distant places.

def.name: Cephalon
def.description: A psychic roar of anger and anguish echoes through your minds and across the blasted ruins of the chasm as an intellect devourer larger than any you've ever seen appears from a blast of blue flame and leaps towards you.

def.name: Wererat Smugglers
def.description: You might not have paid the travelers a second glance, had a bloody arm not slid out from under their wagon's coverings.

def.name: Invisible Chest
def.description: Your stubbed toe is the only reason you know the chest is here. You, in fact, stumbled upon it.

def.name: Invisible Chest
def.description: Your stubbed toe is the only reason you know the chest is here. You, in fact, stumbled upon it.

def.name: Cephalon
def.description: A psychic roar of anger and anguish echoes through your minds and across the blasted ruins of the chasm as an intellect devourer larger than any you've ever seen appears from a blast of blue flame and leaps towards you.

def.name: Bridge Troll
def.description: This troll seems willing to play some kind of game before it feasts on your bones.

def.name: Partially Intact Armory
def.description: This stash of weaponry was partially looted, but may still hold something of value.

def.name: War Troll
def.description: The thought that someone has been training trolls in the art of war and arming them is almost more frightening than the creature itself.

def.name: Shadar-Kai Gloomblade
def.description: As you move in to attack, this towering warrior melds into the shadows and prepares to strike from the darkness.

def.name: Shadar-Kai Gloomblade
def.description: As you move in to attack, this towering warrior melds into the shadows and prepares to strike from the darkness.

def.name: Frost Goblin Cutter
def.description: Before you can be sure what's happening, you find yourself swarmed by an icy group of pointy-nosed assassins.

def.name: Legion Devil
def.description: The armored fiend moves with practiced precision, a consummate warrior form the armies of Hell.

def.name: Enchanted Painting
def.description: Touching the painting, you realize this is a gateway, not art.

def.name: Enchanted Painting
def.description: Touching the painting, you realize this is a gateway, not art.

def.name: Camouflaged Rockfall Trap
def.description: You'd never know there was danger nearby were it not for the dried blood on the stones at your feet.

def.name: Enraged Zombie Hulk
def.description: Its own muscles tearing from bone, the undead monster lunges out at anything it can grab.

def.name: Enraged Zombie Hulk
def.description: Its own muscles tearing from bone, the undead monster lunges out at anything it can grab.
